name: Odys Group
body:
### Welcome to the Odys Group's Cydia Repo.
On this repo we will put different kinds of software we didn't release on the public repos. You can also find beta software we are working on in the repo. If you install these tweaks please make sure to let the developers know about any bugs you find. You can download these beta on your own risk but this is not software for every normal user.


### Disclaimer
The developers William Vabrinskas ([@William_vab](twitter.com/William_vab)), Yue Shen ([@ioshack](twitter/com/ioshack)), Tony Kraft ([@iOSTonyKraft](twitter.com/iOSTonyKraft)) & Kamel Benya ([@dz_cracker83](twitter.com/dz_cracker83)) nor the designer Mete Turna ([@byturna](twitter.com/byturna)) are **NOT** responsible for any damage or problems from beta software. Download & install on your own risk. 


### Support or Contact
If you have any problems with software on the repo or if you have found any bugs please contact us by mailing to hello.odys@gmail.com - Thank you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
